Returns true if a is less than b in the current sorting.

Should be removed and replaced by a function that can merge two vectors of Matches instead.

Merges two vectors of sorted matches.

Target will be sorted and sources empty.

Sorts a vector of SearchMatches.

If it does not link - add more types to the dummy function in the cpp-file.
